page.title: 04Organisations in The Lee
page.content: There are several clubs meeting in the area. The{P.T.A.}of Lee Common School raises funds for the children. The{ {Scout Movement}is strong;40 Cubs, 30 Scouts & 20 Venture Scouts including 2 girls meet weekly in a new HQ next to the Youth Hall.{A Junior Youth Club} meets fortnightly in The Lee Youth Hall, approx. 20 boys & girls,7-10. A voluntary committee runs fund raising events to maintain the building, which also serves as the Village Hall. {The Lee & Ballinger Darby & Joan Club} meets monthly at Ballinger, but many members live in the area. It is open to the over 60's, & is run by a voluntary committee.{The Lee Women's {Institute,}est. 1919, meets in the Youth Hall monthly & has 36 members. It is affiliated to the{N.F.W.I. The {Mother's Union,}connected with the Church of England, has 14 members.
